price: 91. Markaasuu aaday ilaahyadoodii, oo yidhi: Miyeydaan (wax) cuneyn9.
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ
footnotes: 9. Inay cunaan qurbaannada hortooda la dhigay. Waana ku jeesjees iyo muujin caqli xumada dadkaa sanammada hor dhigay raashinka iyo hadiyooyinka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ālihatihim faqāla alā takulūna
